tool.name: histories
tool.command:
parsec histories update_dataset_collection --history_id "$history_id" --dataset_collection_id "$dataset_collection_id"
#if $deleted --deleted "$deleted" #end if #if $name --name "$name" #end if #if $visible --visible "$visible" #end if
| jq -S . > $results

input.name: deleted
input.help: Mark or unmark history dataset collection as deleted

input.name: name
input.help: Replace history dataset collection name with the given string

input.name: visible
input.help: Mark or unmark history dataset collection as visible

tool.help: Update history dataset collection metadata. Some of the attributes that can be modified are documented below.
